definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
hand/(formal) to hold/person engaged in certain types of work/person skilled in certain types of work/personal(ly)/convenient/classifier for skill/CL:雙|双[shuang1],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The sailors took in sail when they saw the storm approach.
sentences.chinese: 水手们看见风暴快来了，就动手收帆。

sentences.english: Nowadays，it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers of sailors.
sentences.chinese: 今天，鞭笞抗命士兵或水手是不人道的惩罚。

sentences.english: He was a member of the team that worked on the voyage of Mariner Nine to Mars.
sentences.chinese: 他是水手九号火星探测器研制小组成员。

sentences.english: The rugged face of the old sailor.
I is just the sailor in the river, to vagabondize in it by a small boat.
sentences.chinese: 我就是河上的一个水手，架着一条小船在河中漂流。

sentences.english: The sailor dipped the ship's flag as a salute.
sentences.chinese: 水手将船上的旗升上去再降下来以示致敬。

sentences.english: What were your duties on board the last vessel?
sentences.chinese: 你作为水手长，在上条船上的主要工作职责是什么？

sentences.english: The sailors couldn't find anything to caulk the seam in the boat.
sentences.chinese: 水手们找不到任何东西来填塞船上的裂缝。

sentences.english: An old expression of the sailors that is still heard is to sail under false colors.
sentences.chinese: 作者认为，也仍能听到老水手表达航行虚假的颜色。

sentences.english: A good seaman is known in bad weather.
At about four o'clock, the roustabouts are roused by the sound of seabirds.
sentences.chinese: 四点左右，海鸟的叫声将使水手从梦中惊醒。

sentences.english: The captain ordered the crew to square away and sail before the wind.
sentences.chinese: 船长命令水手迎风扬帆，乘风行驶。

sentences.english: " On the Town" is about three sailors in New York.
sentences.chinese: 电影《锦城春色》说的是纽约的三个水手。

sentences.english: I know these sailor chaps , “ he said .
TYPICAL USE:Nowadays, it is an inhumane punishment to flog the disobedient soldiers or sailers.
sentences.chinese: 先进，鞭笞不服从的兵士或水手是不人道的惩罚。
